## Notes

-  not sure if there's a way to use this with already counted data. but see xtabs TIL 
-  you can add names with = or dnn 
-  see https://www.spsanderson.com/steveondata/posts/2025-07-14/ on use of with() 




## Example

```{r}
table(type=cheshire_petitions$petition_type, gender=cheshire_petitions$petition_gender) 
 
# table(cheshire_petitions$petition_type, cheshire_petitions$petition_gender, dnn=c("type", "gender")) 

```
